text: was a Japanese judoka. He was head of the Promotions Panel at the Kodokan. He was also in charge of the All Nippon Judo Federation. He was one of only two living Kodokan 10th dan. He was director of the Kodokan International from 1969 to 1997 and director of the Kodokan Council from 1997 to 2004. Abe died in Tokyo, Japan on February 27, 2022 at the age of 99.Ichiro Abe Sensei Has Passed Away ==References== Category:Japanese judoka Category:2022 deaths Category:1922 births
title: Ichiro Abe
